A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I have to be honest and state that I used to trust reviews by rotten tomatoes but never again .
This was a totally incomprehensible movie which could have been covered in a 45 minute time span instead of the 2 1/2 hrs it runs.
Bloody awful doesn't even begin to describe this film.....The plot is weak the storyline is non existent the characters are under used and it's almost like a box full of fan suggestions that never actually gel to form an actual storyline.
The only Force you will encounter is the will to stay awake through an utterly boring movie.
